Alg-TrigExisoseis-SynthTrEx-SectEx2: %# Database File : Alg-TrigExisoseis-SynthTrEx-SectEx2\qt_endl%@ Database source: Mathematics\qt_endlΝα λυθούν οι παρακάτω εξισώσεις.\qt_endl\begin{alist}[leftmargin=3mm]\qt_endl\begin{multicols}{2}\qt_endl\item $ \syn{(3x)}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2} $\qt_endl\item $ \syn{(2x)}=\frac{1}{2} $\qt_endl\item $ \syn{\left( x+\frac{\pi}{4}\right) }=1 $\qt_endl\item $ \syn{\left(4x+\frac{\pi}{6}\right)}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2} $\qt_endl\end{multicols}\qt_endl\end{alist}\qt_endl%# End of file Alg-TrigExisoseis-SynthTrEx-SectEx2
